name: SciLean.Rand.conditionSnd
declaration:
/-- Condition on the second variable of a pair. -/
def SciLean.Rand.conditionSnd {X : Type} {Y : Type} (r : SciLean.Rand (X × Y)) (y : Y) : SciLean.Rand X

name: SciLean.Rand.HasCondition
declaration:
/-- Given random variable `r : Rand (X×Y)`. Can we condition `r` based on observation of `X`?

Can we come up with conditional rand variable `r₂ : X₁ → Rand X₁`  -/
def SciLean.Rand.HasCondition {X : Type} {Y : Type} (r : SciLean.Rand (X × Y)) : Prop

name: SciLean.Rand.condition
declaration: def SciLean.Rand.condition {X : Type} {X₁ : Type} {X₂ : Type} (r : SciLean.Rand X) (dec : X₁ × X₂ ≃ X) (x₁ : X₁) : SciLean.Rand X₂

name: SciLean.Rand.conditionFst
declaration:
/-- Condition on the first variable of a pair. -/
def SciLean.Rand.conditionFst {X : Type} {Y : Type} (r : SciLean.Rand (X × Y)) (x : X) : SciLean.Rand Y
